hero.title: About Us
hero.subtitle: Supporting Resilient Youth. Empowering Families. Strengthening Communities.

paragraphs: Growing up isn't easy -- and no one should face it alone. At Reach For Youth, we walk alongside youth and families during their most vulnerable moments, offering not just services, but a second chance. Whether it's a teenager navigating big emotions, a parent unsure where to turn, or a teacher seeking support for a student, we are here with solutions rooted in care and compassion.

For over 50 years, Reach For Youth has been a trusted nonprofit resource across Central Indiana. Through mental health counseling, restorative justice, and prevention programs, we help youth and families overcome challenges, rediscover hope, and write a new story for their lives.
We don't just believe in youth -- we invest in them. We empower families. And we create space for communities to grow stronger together.

whatWeBelieve.intro: As a Youth Service Bureau, our core mission is to:
points: Support, represent, and protect the rights of young people.
Prevent juvenile delinquency and repeat offenses.
Maintain a strong referral network so families access the right resources at the right time.
Educate our community on the issues facing youth today -- and how to be part of the solution.
whatWeBelieve.closing: From first-time offenders finding a path forward through Teen Court to families receiving crucial mental health counseling, Reach For Youth is where change begins.

ourImpact.narrative: We don't just measure success in statistics -- we measure it in stories. In restored relationships. In futures regained.

teamIntro.title: Our Team
teamIntro.text: Behind every changed life is a committed team of professionals. Our passionate and diverse staff brings together decades of experience in mental health, youth justice, nonprofit leadership, and community outreach. Together, we deliver high-impact programs that meet families where they are -- and move them forward.
